title: Watch out for the hashtag on #event_simpleName and #cid
description: In CrowdStrike searches, #event_simpleName and #cid are tagged fields. Forgetting the leading # changes the meaning of the query. Always include the hashtag when referencing the tagged variants.

examples.name: Example
examples.description: Filters on the tagged fields for event type and customer ID; dropping the hashtag would search a different field or fail to use the tag index.
